page.title: 11LOCAL COUNCIL INNERLEITHEN
page.content: {TWEEDDALE DISTRICT COUNCIL Leithen Water divides Innerleithen into East and West wards, which are represented by two councillors at the meetings of the Tweeddale District Council.All the needs of the community are covered by the work of four major committees_Finance,Technical Services, Environmental Health, Parks and Amenities. Local residents keenly support major projects e.g.drainage of the pond area at Victoria Park,which it is hoped will be developed into a park with childrens play area,raised flower beds and water flowing under a stone bridge A feasibility study is being carried out by the Region re.drainage of area. There are plans to make the town even more attractive with more flowers and another picnic area near Cuddy Bridge.
